list_definition.definition: the outward appearance of, or first impression made by, a person or thing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: On the surface he seems cold and unfriendly, but he’s really a kind person.

list_definition.definition: to put a surface on (a road etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The road has been damaged by frost and will have to be surfaced again.

list_definition.definition: (of a submarine, diver etc) to come to the surface.
